alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 12:28AM CST until February 16 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Western Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1228 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sparta to 8 miles northeast of Taneyville to near Forsyth, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Taneycomo, Ava, Forsyth, Kissee Mills, Taneyville, Wasola, Oldfield, Brownbranch, Elkhead, Powersite, Keltner, Thornfield, Garrison, Rome, Squires, Chadwick, Bradleyville, Goodhope, Long Run and Dogwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
